  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.lang.AutoCloseable, SendableInput

    public class SendableByteArrayInputStream
extends SendableInputStream
    Convenience class for wrapping a ByteArrayInputStream.
